author: glenn
msg: Updated so that href URL's can be relative so that documentation
links work correctly both on the local file system and when uploaded
to jakarta.apache.org/taglibs.  Updated the title to include the
taglib name for all taglibs which have an intro.xml.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added new developer build target 'dev' which builds the example build app in the examples/web/WEB-INF directory so that an Ant build is not required in between edits of a JSP - so JSP can be designed and editted with a RAD build system.

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied up a couple of loose ends in the documentation such that it comes out OK with the new taglib doc kit

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched build files to take advantage of Tim's cool default.pre and default.post mechanism for customising build targets. (I finally figured out how to do it ;-). So now only standard build targets are used, but the local build targets override things
